name: SPAZY
description:
SPAZY is a 3D story mode game. Its history can best be described as a ship in the middle of space filled with menacing robots, intent on doing terrible experiments on humans and in turn enslaving innocent little robots for terrifying trials and mandates.

However, the story does not end there, these robots will not be satisfied until they see all the humans dead or working for them, that is why they will want to destroy the earth at all costs. However, none of this will stop little Tommy, a little robot, who after having lived through all this, will try to escape, but not before having destroyed all these robots and having stopped the ship that will soon destroy the entire earth. 

By:
Joaquin David Lozano Jimenez

Gabriel David  Lozano Ochoa 

Angela Paola Lozano Ochoa
